Reviews.Title: Well built, easy install, good night vision
Reviews.Author: LBJ
Reviews.Content: This little camera is very well built with an alumimum body and sliding sun shield. Please note that the camera bracket that I received is not the one pictured on Amazon. The good news is that it is smaller, the same color as the camera and may be metal, just not sure. I really think they have upgraded this part of the camera. Nice! This camera is about half the length of two other cameras that I just recently purchased. SVAT CV31 Hi-Res Outdoor CCD Security Camera w/Long Range Night Vision Please read my Amazon review on this camera! Both of these cameras are about the same in picture and construction quality. The Svat camera comes with 60' of power/video cable with RCA connectons only. Your may need these 20 Pcs of BNC Male Connectors Adapters for RG59 Coaxial Cable 1FV  to complete hookup to your DVR card in your computer. If plugging into a TV you will not need these connectors. The VideoSecur camera has the BNC connector so just order your video/power cable with BNC connectors VideoSecu 3 X 50 Feet Power Video Cable with BNC RCA Connector for CCTV Security Cameras 1QA The VideoSecur camera does come with the power adaptor, you just will need the power/video cable. The BNC connectors twist lock at the connection, RCA cables do not. I like the BNC connectors better as they will not come apart. The day time picture is great. The night vision is about the same on both cameras up to 45 feet or so with no additional lighting. I just installed 2 motion detection floodlights which are also a great 5 star product from Amazon (Heath Zenith SL-5525-WH 250-Watt Quartz Motion-Sensing Light) and these make the night picture almost a good as daytime. The Svat and the VideoSecur camera will both do motion recording when hooked up to a DVR card that supports this feature. Since I have motion detection on my cameras and floodlights I can clearly indentify which one of my neighbors cats is digging in my flower bed and leaving paw prints on the roof of my car at 3 AM in the morning. How about that! I put some signs up that I purchased in the windows warning folks that they are on camera and being recorded. I do feel much safer in my home and I think that a potential unwanted guest will probably move to another home to commit a crime. (Sorry about that neighbors). I certainly would not hesitate to recommend this 5 star camera. The only thing I can't say is how long they will last, only time will tell. I can say that all 4 cameras I have ordered where packaged well for shipping and all worked right out of the box.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Mac Coder
Reviews.Content: UPDATE: I have 4 of these, and they have worked fine for almost two years now.-----------Note that all security cameras with built-in IR illuminators suffer from a common issue: the illuminator picks up on dust motes and tiny insects floating in the air right in front of the lens and turns them into giant bright white blobs, triggering video-based motion detection (if you are using such). This generates numerous false alarms.Fortunately, the solution is simple -- turn off the IR on the camera and use an external IR source. This camera doesn't have a switch for that purpose, but you can simply unscrew the cylindrical case near the front, revealing the IR module surrounding the lens, Unplug the IR module, and that problem (at least) is solved. For extra McGyver points, you can remove the IR module from the camera, connect it to 12Vdc, and mount it away from the camera but pointed at the camera's view -- Voila! Night vision without the giant blobs. I assume that removing the module would void the warranty, but what does McGyver care about warranties?For the McGyver-impaired, there are nice 850nm IR illuminators available from Amazon for under $10 ("YY Trade IR30" OR "YY_IR30", ASIN B001P2E4U4). This is a good match to the built-in illuminator in the camera.For an inexpensive color camera, this unit has exceptional low light capability, and excellent IR sensitivity at 850nm, the wavelength of most IR illuminators. The IR functionality is pixel-by-pixel, meaning that you can have a scene that is partly illuminated by natural light and partly by IR, and the natural light portion will be in color, and the IR part in glorious monochrome.The 3.6mm lens provides an excellent wide field of view.The supplied mount is flexible and sturdy, although not a true ball-socket mount.The supplied 12Vdc supply is the smallest I have seen.The supplied security sticker... is a security sticker.

Reviews.Title: videosecu IRX5
Reviews.Author: Patrick W. Moriearty
Reviews.Content: The camera appeared to be high quality. Much better than the cameras that came with my Swann DVR. Color day and night. Had good range on the IR. Unfortunately half of the IR led's are out or dim. Beyond the Amazon and seller's return date of 30 days, does not appear to be any warranty. Contacted videosecu.com, no reply. Oh, well! Still works, just doesn't shine out as far. Will not purchase any more videosecu cameras and cannot recommend.

Reviews.Title: Water got in every single camera destroying the ir board.
Reviews.Author: Michael Rubinstein
Reviews.Content: If i could give it a zero i would. All cameras fogged up because of leaking water and ir boards destroyed... Waste of money. I had to take everything apart and now buying replacements!!!! Dont buy these ones. They are not utilizing o rings but instead flat rings that leak. Horrible because i even helped a friend out and insisted on him buying these same ones after my install.. He bought 4 and they all leaked as well...

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: alabamaranger
Reviews.Content: Unit did not last a full year. Video camera started filling up with water. Suppose to be an out side camera. Would not buy again.

Reviews.Title: Great For the Price!
Reviews.Author: sephonda peters
Reviews.Content: // To view this video download Flash Player (version 9.0.115 or higher)'); } } catch(err) { fp_resizePlayerSpace('cv_mo1BQT0PM59FFJ4', 0, 0); } return false; } function _cv_mo1BQT0PM59FFJ4loadSwf(movieID, playerVersion) { var swfLocation = "http://g-ecx.images-amazon.com/images/G/01/am3/20120510035744301/AMPlayer._V148501545_.swf"; logTag.type = "text/javascript"; logTag.src = "/gp/customer-media/du/log.html?ie=UTF8&p=CustomerImage&s=CustomerVideoPlay"; head[0].appendChild(logTag); } if (cv_mo1BQT0PM59FFJ4currentClick) { return cv_mo1BQT0PM59FFJ4currentClick(); } } } Length:: 9:48 MinsHere is a video of my yard man out in the yard. The camera is up about 10 Feet high. As you can see the coverage is great. The colors are correct on this camera. If you are using a low budget bullet-cam (like the ones in the bundled kits)... do yourself a favor and upgrade. This also has superior night vision compared to the zMODO bullet cam I replaced. The only think I can think that I do not really care for is the mount. Also, If I were to buy another camera, I would suggest finding one with 500-600 TVL (Depending on your DVR's resolution options). Overall this a great camera for the price!

Reviews.Title: excellent little camera
Reviews.Author: doug j svuba
Reviews.Content: I bought the Q-see 8-channel dvr which included 4 cameras.I bought this one for my upgraded main camera.  I am very pleased.  the picture is much better than the standard cameras.

Reviews.Title: Excellent Security Camera
Reviews.Author: BobH
Reviews.Content: This is an excellent security camera, especially in low light.  However, it is not an HD camera, probably in part because of the low-light capability.  The daytime image has a slight halo effect around dark items as the CCD kicks up the gain, but this is a benefit, not a problem in security applications.  I especially like the field of view provided by the wide angle lens.  After using it for a week I am ordering several more for other camera locations.  I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: I'm impressed
Reviews.Author: JRD
Reviews.Content: I am impressed with this camera. I ordered it to replace one I had over looking the drive way. WOW! What a difference there is. Instead of seeing part of one car in the driveway and one in the street, I see the entire driveway with two cars and the front. A very wide street view! And the night view is excellent. I have uploaded a picture of the view at night overlooking my driveway at night with no lights on. The three other cameras have some night vision, but this new camera really shows everything. And for the price I paid....it's a deal. Amazon got it here very quick, I hooked it up in minutes, and adjusted the camera within seconds. The arm that mounts the camera is metal, and you can adjust easily. Once it's locked into place it stays steady. You cannot find a better wide view/night vision camera for this price!

Reviews.Title: Poor outdoor service
Reviews.Author: Flannag
Reviews.Content: I purchased 4 of these cameras based on the metal construction and price....1. All the cameras have had IR led's burn out, this does affect the night vision.2. One of the cameras had the power supply cord go bad.3. One of the cameras collected rain water and became water logged(unusable now).4. Manfacturer warranty only covers the product for 90 day.(i.e., they know it's crap)5. Screws that come with it are not going to work for most mounting applications, buy some scres to mount it.6. Don't buy videosecu cameras...very poor quality.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Cam, X00092Y35D
Reviews.Author: P. Young "no nonsense critic"
Reviews.Content: I am not in the habit of doing reviews, but this cam is about as good as one can expect for the price. I have dozens of similarly priced cams purchased over the past 10 years so I have  a lotexperience in this area. Most home CCTV cams do a reasonable job in day light, but too often fail badly at night.  What makes this superior is the excellent gamma, based on visual observation, not measurement.  At night, black areas are displayed a satisfying deep black, while whites are captured with the proper intensity.  Note that poorly made cams (most of the el cheapos) tend to blur a range of shades between black and white.  Running a quick A-B test on my older cams, it was immediate that this cam had superior fine details in its night mode.  As someone mentioned, this cam is rated at only 420 lines, but it out performed cams with higher line rating. It was the main reason why I decided to take a chance with this cam.  Over the years, I learn that it isn't the number of lines, but how linear is the gamma response.  You can have 520 lines, and poor gamma and end up with a blurring of details.  Swann DVR have some of the worst cams made, where at night, dark areas comes out flat gray, and bright white areas comes out a dull gray.  I am in the process of  replacing most of them.The wide angle lens is not just a plus, but is a must for good coverage when placed in a corner of a room.  With a standard lens, you lose about 30% of the view presented by this cam.  In some cases, I would need two cams to provide enough coverage.  Not anymore.  Also, the mount is a decent sturdy mount, compared to the flimsy mount found in cheap cams.One reason I am contributing this review is that it is nearly impossible to buy cams based on the specs provided.  As explained above, number of lines doesn't cut it. For lack of full professional specs, we are all buying a pig in a poke.  Thanks to Amazon user reviews, we now have a better chance of beating the odds.

Reviews.Title: Added to my ZMODO 500GB Security System - WOW this camera is WAY better!
Reviews.Author: JUCD VPR
Reviews.Content: This camera rocks!! I bought the ZMODO 4 channel and 8 channel systems. Pretty decent system but the cameras did not have a very wide view and the colors were off by a lot as in my black shorts showed pink on the stock zmodo cameras and night vision was ok, maybe 15 feet but still a little to dark unless my motion lights turned on (I bought the Mr Beams motion detector lights and I really like them in addition to my security cam system)  SO I looked around for something better and found this Camera to ADD to my system for $49 bucks. Same hook ups as the cameras that came with my ZMODO system so install was just as easy! WOW this camera blows away my other stock ZMODO cameras, Colors are great and a night and day difference compared to the regular zmodo cameras that come with the kit. NIght vision IR is AWESOME compared to the other stock Zmodo cameras also. Like i'm talking way brighter and easy to see than my regular zmodo cameras. Now I can not wait to get more of these because it really shows my zmodo cams suck in comparison, my wife agrees 100%! I'll be buying a few more of these very soon. Wide angle is great! Colors are great! For $49 I don't think you can beat this cam as an add on to improve your system.

Reviews.Title: 700 TVL camera
Reviews.Author: FORDF150
Reviews.Content: I recived this item new and in perfect condition. Worked right out of the box as it is suppose to. I thought it had variable lens it does but it is manual variable you have to get to the camera to change the lens. Very good picture and the night vision works well to about 70 feet. In the day time the picture is sharp and crisp.....

Reviews.Title: Broke within the first ten days of use
Reviews.Author: Ulrich Reinhardt
Reviews.Content: I liked the camera while it worked: strong enough IR LEDs for what I needed (just 8 feet distance) and a decent picture, day or night. The LEDs still work, but the camera  now (after maybe ten nights of use) only delivers  a completely blurred picture. Granted, I used it in a moist environment, but since it is supposed to be weather-proof, this should not have been an issue.

Reviews.Title: Disappointing
Reviews.Author: Jerry A. Pugh "Jerry"
Reviews.Content: This camera replaced a Q-see camera that had stopped working, it was easy to install and used the same wiring that the other camera used.  The picture is not as sharp nor was the color as good as the Q-see. The camera monitors my driveway which is 40 feet long, at that distance there is very little detail to the picture, spend a little more money and get a camera with a higher resolution, wish I had.

Reviews.Title: Pretty good camera - Not spectacular by any means
Reviews.Author: Nylox
Reviews.Content: This camera is decent and has "OK" night vision.  I'm not blown away nor disappointed with this camera.  For my needs this wide angle camera works well.  I have much better cameras and some worse cameras so this one falls in the middle.  For the money it's about what I expected.  As all wide angle cameras, it is difficult to make out detail at any range.  The LEDs appear to be much brighter then some of the competition.  If I need another camera (of this caliber) I will probably get this one again.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: I ordered two of these cameras to add to my DVR recorder.  The cameras appear to be well built and provide a good image.  They are small and easy to conceal when mounting.  The only negative I can say about them is the mounting brackets included with them leave a LOT to be desired.  They are small and do not appear to be very strong.  Also,and this is my big complaint, they will only allow the camera to mount on a vertical wall.  I need to mount my cameras to the soffit of my house and need a horizontal mount.  I ordered some other mounting brackets.  You might want to do the same.I would order these cameras again, but would also order separate mounting brackets at the same time.

Reviews.Title: Not as good as review show
Reviews.Author: Yahme
Reviews.Content: I brought this because of a great review.  I think it is a piece of crap.  My old camera with 420TVL give a better and sharper images compare to this one.  I waste all this time and now it is on the way back to amazon.

Reviews.Title: day n night ccd camera
Reviews.Author: jojo58
Reviews.Content: I have installed four of this surveillance camera in my house. They are well built and the day and night video performance is excellent.

Reviews.Title: THEY LEAK
Reviews.Author: JIM CRANDALL
Reviews.Content: 3 out of 4 cameras have water in them. while they still work in daytime, there is no Night vision... that's when I need them. looking at other manufactures.

Reviews.Title: Had to return
Reviews.Author: MeSeemore
Reviews.Content: The power source inside the camera didn't  work so I guess the camera didn't work .  The "cord" was ok....  Called in my friend to make sure I was plugging everything right - this is the third one I have hooked up - and it definitely didn't get any power... returned it  - THAT will be where the rubber meets the road - on the refund stay tuned will let you know!

Reviews.Title: IR stopped working after 1 month
Reviews.Author: Jose H DaSilva
Reviews.Content: good picture during the day, night picture ok, but one of the cameras after a month lost the IR  so I lost the night surveillance

Reviews.Title: Nothing really wrong with it but you can get high rez cameras for around the same price
Reviews.Author: Joshua T.
Reviews.Content: Bought this thing on Amazon and a few days later found the camera that replaced it.  this is a 420tvl and i got a 700tvl camera for maybe 5 bucks more?  Maybe even 10 bucks less I cant remember.  Keep looking and get a 700tvl.  420 is garbage.

Reviews.Title: Started out great, but....
Reviews.Author: Gadget Guru
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera last summer (2012), so I've had it for just under a year.All was well up until a week ago (end of January). The camera was working fine, the night vision was fine and the quality ws good enough.Then a bunch of the LEDs failed suddenly. They didn't fail gradually. 75% of them failed at once, negating a good amount of the night vision. I see others have had similar failures. I haven't had water issues like some have reported, though.During the day, the camera still gives decent images - and I really like the wider angle lens for more coverage compared to some cameras with narrower fields of view.Luckily, I had an older camera of a different brand with a similar LED array. The older camera had been damaged and wasn't working, but the board with the LEDs was functional. As a result, I was able to swap it it with the defective LED board from this camera.So, it's back working again and is functioning well, but I have to knock off a couple of stars for the quality. I have a feeling the manufacturer is using lower powered LEDs than they ought to and running them higher than they should be to get more low light performance - a common practice.If the replacement LED board fails, I'll probably look into another brand to replace the camera.

Reviews.Title: Clear Bright night security
Reviews.Author: Mike Parris
Reviews.Content: Better picture and Clarity than my last $150 dollar IR camera. Hopefully it will hold up for the long term,

Reviews.Title: Super Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Mark M. Tanner
Reviews.Content: I first started with an Astak CMOS security cameras.  The daylight video was good but the night vision was not good at all.  After a few years I upgraded to some SVAT cameras.  The daylight and night vision video was much better than the Astak, but the night vision was still not great.I just bought this VideoSecu camera as a test.  I am totally blown away with this camera.  The daylight video is super.  It gives a much clearer view, larger video area and distance.  Much greater distance and clarity than the other cameras.  The night vision is better that the daylight video of the other cameras.  It is really just like looking out during the day.  I was not expecting the camera to be as good as it is for the price.  I highly recommend this camera and I plan to replace all my cameras with this model.

Reviews.Title: night vision
Reviews.Author: troll62
Reviews.Content: Video view is awesome color is spot on and can barely tell a difference between day and night. bought one to replace a broken security camera and am replacing the others with the same camera. can see details at night the others couldn't pick up at dusk

Reviews.Title: NICE CLEAR & SHARP
Reviews.Author: I. GLENN
Reviews.Content: This is my third IR camera; but my first of this brand. The daylight views are beautiful, and super clear. The color output is sharp, and vibrant, and the night vision does better in low light; not enough IR Leds for complete darkness viewing. Really nice camera for the price, just wish it had the microphone built in, like my other camerasReally impressed with the multi positional bracket

Reviews.Title: Best night vision for the price
Reviews.Author: jtybt
Reviews.Content: What can I say, This is the 3rd pair I've bought. This model has the brightest night vision for 420 lines with it's infra-red lights.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Rodster
Reviews.Content: Had it installed for a week, and it is far better than the 5 year old and more expensive Sony that it replaced because it stopped working.Very brightly illuminated at night at good distance for my gate security camera use.Additional comments.==============Jan 2013I have bought five more of these and installed 6 months ago on new house. They are working well. Higher resolution would be nice for the DVR recordings. But they work very well and night vision is incredible.

Reviews.Title: Wide angle cameras
Reviews.Author: tomkat333
Reviews.Content: These cameras work extemmely well with my system.  i can see much more than with the originals.  Well worth the cost.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu
Reviews.Author: smokintn
Reviews.Content: VideoSecu camera's are a great buy,we are using six of them inside and outside at the shop with no problems at all../real happy with then.always Glenn

Reviews.Title: eyespy
Reviews.Author: pitterpat
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera  with hopes that it would have good resolution and excellent night vision and it has lived up to their claims. The only thing was adjusting the focus and zoom was a bit tricky. The camera is worth the expense.

Reviews.Title: Good value camera
Reviews.Author: J Sherbahn "Sherban"
Reviews.Content: I can't comment on long term relieability since I have only had this camera running for two days so far, but quality of construction seems good, image quality is good...nice natural colors and resolution looks pretty good too. Compared to some CMOS cameras that came bundled with my DVR, this one's quality is MUCH better...both color and resolution. The night vision capability is quite good too, again much better than the CMOS cameras that came with my DVR. This seems like a solid unit that offers good value....I like it and will consider buying more.

Reviews.Title: awesome!
Reviews.Author: albert guillette
Reviews.Content: This is a very well built camera! It works very good and will be buying another one! I am very happy with it!

Reviews.Title: No Focus
Reviews.Author: Sonny185
Reviews.Content: This kind of what you paid for......We sell video systems for commerical sites and of course our DVR's are pretty high quality.  My customers are always asking about these less expensive types of camera.  I purchased this on to try at our facility to review the results.  The camera operates as stated, night vision is okay too.  However, the is no way to focus this camera as this camera is a fixed focus type system.  That fact alone, keeps you from getting sharp images.  Since this is my first experience with low cost cameras (our cameras run from $250-$600 each)my expectations might have been too high.  This camera does a fair job without the focus capability, but being able to focus in on a object, is key to a good surveillance systems.  You get what you paid for.

Reviews.Title: Excellent night vision, wide angle, very clear picture
Reviews.Author: ramman "JJramman"
Reviews.Content: I have a Zmodo system that came with 4 little cameras with poor night vision and poor image quality. These cameras (bought 2) are excellent!  They have a decently wide angle, and the night vision is spectacular. One camera lights up a decent portion of my backyard.The supplied mounting bracket is a little weird, but overall easy to install.

Reviews.Title: Night vision performance
Reviews.Author: Kenneth J. Michel
Reviews.Content: Night vision performance not very good. IR leds flare into lens creating a blind spot  flare which screws up the gain raising the noise level resulting in a poor night time image. I also have  a Toshiba camera which has excellent performance.  I should send it back.

Reviews.Title: Camera looks Good and works!
Reviews.Author: Chemicalman588
Reviews.Content: Camera was priced right, looks good and worked right out of box. very easy to mount and install. Looks nicer than black color!

Reviews.Title: FAIRLY GOOD PRODUCT
Reviews.Author: D_MAN1925
Reviews.Content: IT WOULD HAVE BEEN A GOOD PRODUCT IF THE 12 VOLT DC POWER SUPPLY THAT CAME WITH THE CAMERA WOULD HAVE WORKED.

Reviews.Title: I've ordered these before and I like them
Reviews.Author: Holyoak
Reviews.Content: These camera's have held up pretty good. I've had some in the past that the infrared bulbs burn out and make for a lousy night mode. These however have held up well.

Reviews.Title: very good
Reviews.Author: Awad
Reviews.Content: easy to install its picture is clear in day time and is good in the night its very good cam thank you

Reviews.Title: For the money  I like this camera
Reviews.Author: donald treull
Reviews.Content: Mounting bracket could have been better ,but as for the camera it is doing what I need.I will be buying more of these

Reviews.Title: Great Camer
Reviews.Author: Jeff Krc
Reviews.Content: Great Camera, Fast shipping.. Good quality! I will prob buy more! Shakes a little in the wind, but I can deal with that!

Reviews.Title: Good for around the house
Reviews.Author: gwalton9944
Reviews.Content: Good camera for home surveillance use, optical does have a visual curve when viewing, know way for adjusting lens. But does connect and adjusting mounts are easy.

Reviews.Title: Video security Ir bullet security camera
Reviews.Author: Gary W. Auxier
Reviews.Content: It has good quality day and night it gives me a added security but I recomend adding motion lights to help in dark areasthe light warn off unwanted intruders.and now you have them on camera too.

Reviews.Title: Somewhat better than the price would indicate
Reviews.Author: ROY WINTERS
Reviews.Content: Camera has been in service for a few months now.  It is a good value, but not outstanding as a camera.  In my use it remains in color mode even at night (that is likely caused by a street light).  I'd say it pretty much matches it's description, and it has continued to work, so I've nothing to complain about.

Reviews.Title: So far, a GREAT outdoors camera !
Reviews.Author: Richard A
Reviews.Content: I'm very impressed with this little buddy; it has really great day time color, and in regards to the infra red feature, works great too. I live on the third floor of an apartment complex, and placed it out my window over looking the parking lot below; has a very wide angle vantage. Cons : the screw that connects the camera could be a little longer, as well as the mounting screws for the main mounting

Reviews.Title: Great picture.
Reviews.Author: MrCaspers
Reviews.Content: This camera has great color and really good picture quality.  It does a better job at night with color and picture quality as well.  I use this camera above my front door.  I always have my porch lights on at night.  The extra light allows some color and better definition at night.  It also comes with a power supply which is really handy.  I would definitely buy again.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: James R. Herrin
Reviews.Content: For the price these are really good cameras.  They are especially good in low light.  Even when it appears to be dark out, I am still getting good color displays.  I have had these for several months and haven't noticed any degradation in quality.  Recommend.

Reviews.Title: Great Product
Reviews.Author: Lee Taylor
Reviews.Content: Works great even at night.. vision is super.Mounts easy and easy to connect .It also works great in a sunny area

Reviews.Title: Perfect add on to Night Owl 8 cam system
Reviews.Author: Phoenecian
Reviews.Content: I purchased this to add to one slot on my 8 channel system. I wanted a camera that had actual color and most importantly had a wide field of view to pan the front of my house and parking area. Worked perfectly for this purpose. I have only had online for two days but I think as long as it lasts, that it serves its purpose perfectly in this case. It has survived two thunderstorms and the rain x I put on the lens worked perfectly. The night vision lives up to its stats as well. Wish all my cameras were this good. I think I'll get another for the rear of the house and gradually replace failed cameras with these models. Although, after 4 years all 6 of my Night owl cameras have functioned near perfection. As long as you microfiber the fogging from the lenses every 6 months to maintain a crisp and clear image  day and night. Highly recommended, and thumbs up on Video Secu camera with wide field view.

Reviews.Title: wouldnt recommend these cameras
Reviews.Author: Linda Potter
Reviews.Content: The quality of the picture isnt that good especially at night.  you cant see anything with it.  I wouldnt recommend these cameras to anyone that would like them to work at night.They dont work at all

Reviews.Title: Security Camera
Reviews.Author: BLC
Reviews.Content: This is a nice camera. It is well made and gives a good picture, even at night. I would recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for ,  minus  the  audio pickup.
Reviews.Author: K. Quaintance
Reviews.Content: Good  wide-angle day-night vision with true colors.  The camera is a bit larger ,  but it works  well.  I’m Very impressed with the quality of the picture. I added  a mic next to it –sold separately --  and without spending too much  money ,  I was able  to  cover  my  driveway and  the street  beyond.  Just what I wanted  : )

Reviews.Title: Veiw and color
Reviews.Author: Ronald Thompson
Reviews.Content: I liked the color and who well I could see ever thing very clear I am going to purchase three more

Reviews.Title: wow
Reviews.Author: ken
Reviews.Content: very nice camera the best yet for the money,great picture, i got it to cover back yard witch is very big the old camera works fine but this one i can see the whole yard some of the street and the guy next door yard,,this is alsome..easy to install works very well..i plan on buying one more just because ..

Reviews.Title: GREAT CAMERA..at a EXCELLENT PRICE
Reviews.Author: maidahweh
Reviews.Content: Great camera at an excellent price..harder to set up that established. I had to hire someone. I do enjoy the fact that it is programed to y cell phone so when I am out of town I can still view the outside of my house. It's also programmed for motion too..love it..

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase!
Reviews.Author: Devin Halbert
Reviews.Content: I use this camera for outside my man cave to see who's there before I open the door, and it works great! I love it! However, not the best quality, but for the price it's a great buy!

Reviews.Title: Good balance of price and reliabilty
Reviews.Author: Aris Abeleda
Reviews.Content: Don't settle for the cheaper models even from the same company.  This model is moderately priced but works very well.  It just gives me the right amount of focus and wide angle but not as much as a varifocal one.

Reviews.Title: Very nice
Reviews.Author: Anthony Araya
Reviews.Content: For the price, I was not expecting a lot of difference with the ones I already had. But when I installed it, I realized that the ones I had were not as good as I thought. This camera is SO much better, day or night. It is definitely a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Excellent! Love the wide angle view. Rugged little camera.
Reviews.Author: John Chalinder "Gentleman & Rogue"
Reviews.Content: This little camera is the perfect replacement for my old cam. Now I can see the whole parking lot from property edge to property edge. The old camera has now been relegated to watching my side porch; while this beauty watches the whole of the front of the property. Easy to install and wire. Worked great right out of the box. And at this price, I'd recommend it to anyone who is looking for a solid, inexpensive security solution.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera for the money, nice truly wide view, mostly good color
Reviews.Author: PacoDeth
Reviews.Content: After purchasing a cheaply priced (but well working) Zmodo 8 camera DVR kit I decided to see about updating some of the default Zmodo cameras that came with the unit to something better for areas that need it.  One problem with the Zmodo units is that they had an extremely narrow field of view.  Putting one above my garage door meant I could only see about 30% of the two car driveway.I decided to give this VideoSecu camera a shot and was a little hesitant due to the low price.  Can't be any more happy with the unit.  Not only is it a much wider viewing angle which can pick up all 100% of my two car driveway and a bit of the grass on either side, it also had a better picture quality and color balance.Will definitely consider picking some more of these units up for areas that need a wider field of view or a better quality picture.The only downsides I could say is that the unit can really only be mounted on a wall based on the included camera mounts adjustability.  The unit it replaced was mounted under a overhang and could adjust to any degree so I had to move where I mounted it.  So not so great for mounting on a ceiling, but great adjustments for mounting onto a wall.See my picture in the customer images to see the difference between the Zmodo and the VideoSecu unit.

Reviews.Title: Tried Another VideoSecu with this model ...AMAZING
Reviews.Author: AMD
Reviews.Content: I already have 4 VideoSecu cameras that I purchased on Amazon and very happy with their performance..wanted to get this model just to see if the extra LEDS and a little larger size are different..plus I would have a spare.....the other 4 have been through snow, rain, wind and freezing temps in the single digits and with no problems....I received this within 2 days of  ordering so when it came last night I just had to swap out one of  my other bullet cameras with this one for a test......I can't believe the wide view and the visibility in complete darkness for a great distance. Blows me away!  I waited to do the reviews  of the other cameras to get part way through the winter to see how they held up.so I assume this will be just as good in the long run ....will leave this one up now for the large view and distance at night.....

Reviews.Title: upgrade from zmodo
Reviews.Author: Roger Taylor
Reviews.Content: Has wider view then less expensive zmodo cameras, but resolution didn't improve much.  Wish that had ordered a more expensive camera.

Reviews.Title: Excellent camera
Reviews.Author: Dave Review
Reviews.Content: The camera is everything it is advertised to be. I get clear sharp imagery and it really lights up the night  as well. I am thinking of buying another one to replace a camera that... by comparison... doesn't look so good.It shipped quickly, and arrived well packaged and safe, when it was supposed to. A positive experience all around.

Reviews.Title: Night to Day
Reviews.Author: javier
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera to replace the bullet camera that was included with the Zmodo home surveillance system I purchased on Amazon. This camera is a little bigger than the other camera but still is not too big. It connected just like the other camera so I did not have to replace any wires. The biggest differences are the I/R quality and the field of coverage. This camera literally turns night to daylight and is very clear. The amount of ground covered is much better as well. I will try to attach a before and after camera shot if I can. The one draw back, which is not a problem for me, is that you loose the ability to see close-up. In order to expand the field it has to pan out. I am going to buy another one for the rear of my house.

Reviews.Title: WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW
Reviews.Author: JUAN PERDOMO
Reviews.Content: GOOD: Excelent wide screen. Can cover a very big area. Nigth and day vision, excellent for the price. it's made of  good materials. Excellent price/quality.BAD:  Came with the lens out of place. it seems, at the factory they left a screw loosed, and I had to open the camera and screw it again. Maybe only my camera came like that, but had very disappointed.

Reviews.Title: Razor Sharp Images
Reviews.Author: rd
Reviews.Content: I have two other cameras in my home security system but needed something with a wider field of view.  I thought my other cameras were very good, but this camera is like the difference between watching an old vhs tape and an HD Tv broadcast.  The image is super sharp and contrasty, much like an HD broadcast picture...no kidding.  People are very recognizable images and the field of view is fantastic.  I will be ordering another one very soon.The price is very fair for this camera. Hookup was a breeze.The only negative is the night vision infrared lighting doesn't extend very far, but I don't care about that.  The camera has such a great low light image you only need a small amount of light to get a great image.  As a matter of fact I will probably try to disable the IR lights.  You will be very happy with this camera.

Reviews.Title: infrared camera
Reviews.Author: Franka
Reviews.Content: Working great, wired it into my dvd player and record each night for 7 hours. The picture is pretty clear, I could see a face fairly clearly.Don't know how well the night vision works because I keep flood lights on my work truck that keeps getting broken into.Yeah, apparently the lights help the thieves see! Hopefully they can see the camera and leave it alone!going to post a picture of the view if possible.

Reviews.Title: Really Good Camera for the price
Reviews.Author: Sam
Reviews.Content: Just installed this camera and the night vision is really good, better than some of more expensive cameras, i have 8 camera now and just ordered 2 more of these. I can't believe how good this camera is for the price. Defiantly recommend this camera!

Reviews.Title: night light
Reviews.Author: HAROLD S. RUSSELL "russ541"
Reviews.Content: This is the best camera i own for my security system i am impressed with the picture quality and the wide angle includes enough area to make it more usefull than the other cameras i own, the night vision is very good .as i replace some of my other cameras this will be my choice thanks for an excellent cameraRuss

Reviews.Title: Great replacement camera for starter system
Reviews.Author: J. Ustica
Reviews.Content: I recently installed a cheap Zmodo DVR system on my home. The cameras that were bundled with it are terrible, with incorrect colors (black displaying purple, and green displaying brown) and awful IR performance. I bought this camera as a replacement for my driveway cam and wow, what a difference. The daytime picture looks good, but the IR is 100% better. The IR illumination has great throw. The wide angle lens works well to see the larger area. The Zmodo power supply couldn't power this camera, so I did have to use the included power supply by hooking it into the Zmodo wire bundle I already ran, which worked perfectly. I'm going to purchase a few more of these to replace the junk cameras that came in my kit.The only reason I deduct one star is because the dinky mounting screw supplied with this wouldn't let me attach the mount to the top of the camera. There is a threaded hole there, but the screw isn't long enough to thread in. Other than that small complaint, this camera is good value for the money.Update: After almost 4 months about half of the IR LEDs have burned out on this camera. Deducting another star for this. Still not a bad camera for the price, as there aren't many alternatives in this price range. No fogging or leaking problems, but my camera is mounted under the eve so there is no direct exposure to precipitation. We'll see how it handles cold winter temps. I'll update my review in a few months.Update: I have three of these cameras mounted now, all for just over 1 year. The IR LEDs have almost completely failed on all three. The LEDs seem to be arranged in 4 banks/quadrants. None of the cameras have more than one functional bank of LEDs. Surprisingly, they still have good clarity at night even with minimal IR illumination. The cameras themselves are functioning well in all other aspects.

Reviews.Title: Indoor Outdoor Security Camera
Reviews.Author: Randy Zarn "Randy"
Reviews.Content: I am realy pleased with these new cameras, they have a much clearer picture day and night than the stock cameras that came with my system.I would suggest these to anybody that would like to upgrade there cameras.

Reviews.Title: great night vision
Reviews.Author: LI
Reviews.Content: it is a great night vision camera. minor issue - sometime color changes to black . If it is sensor-record type camera then it will be prefect for me. I can not complain with this price

Reviews.Title: VideoSecure CCD wide angle camera w/night vision (via Amazon)
Reviews.Author: watchinu
Reviews.Content: Pros:This camera seems to be fair - to - good overall.  I wish it had the secure wire (BNC Connector) which feeds through the mounting bracket directly in to the drilled hole so as not to allow an obvious spot to cut it, but hey, it's an "economical" camera.  Easy to mount and yes it does come with the power supply just in case your other cameras have used up all available power ports as in my case.  It seems durable and the daytime picture quality is very sharp.Daytime:  Provides sharp clear wide angle view for a solid 50+ feet.  Daytime view better than my original NightOwl cameras.Cons:Night:  Picture quality drops off significantly.  Only about 15 feet or so with IR on.  In spite of its advertised distance and quality.  Pixelates as well which makes the view it does provide less desirable.  In my case, at night I only want to cover about 20 or so feet of my driveway so it is acceptable, but only barely.  The NightOwl cameras really shine here ( I think they are made by Sony) ; the VideoSecure cameras are not as good...Overall a good buy for the money but be aware of night views.  Maybe there is something wrong with my cameras, but all IR's are on so I can't say for sure.  If I can figure out a solution for the night view I will update the camera review to 5 out of 5.  Its all about day/night quality and durability.  Right now I can't give it more than 3 because I expected more in the night vision quality.

Reviews.Title: Better than night owl
Reviews.Author: D Primeaux
Reviews.Content: I have purchas a knight owl system and bought this spare camera and its better than the Knight owls system

Reviews.Title: very good quality camera
Reviews.Author: clampertim
Reviews.Content: This unit was bought to replace another that had quit working.  I consider the picture quality way better that the old one.  The night vision is excellent at 30 ft.  Great buy!

Reviews.Title: SHARP @ WIDE
Reviews.Author: ben
Reviews.Content: GREAT PIC WITH A LOT OF WIDE ANGLE JUST ORDERED 2 MORE THEY WILL BE INSTALLED THUR. NIGHT MY DAUGHTER VIEW  THE PICS FROM 700 MILES AWAY

Reviews.Title: great value
Reviews.Author: Robert Crowell "busterspal"
Reviews.Content: Good color and sharpness daytime. Good wide angle for close quarters. Night vison without added illumination much better than similarly priced cameras.

Reviews.Title: does what it says
Reviews.Author: Nash
Reviews.Content: Does a pretty good job.viewing my new chicks in the back yard pen.Only problem is after the summer you don't want a cord coming into the house to your TV so you can see things.  If it was wireless I would buy a couple.Night vision was good too.  Sorry no pics.

Reviews.Title: hmmm??
Reviews.Author: Lisa Marie
Reviews.Content: havent put it up yet cause im not sure if its the right one to transmit to my computer and Kindle fire hd 8.9

Reviews.Title: Impressive day and night performance
Reviews.Author: J. Burwell
Reviews.Content: These cameras have exceeded my expectations. The specifications are indeed as indicated, with acceptable resolution, clear focus, and crisp images with realistic colors. The focal length is appropriate for installation at gates and doors -- wide enough to capture a landing. The night vision does an excellent job, with daytime-like images in two porticos I have, and better-than-expected views of open space, although there is some minor spotlight-effect out in the open.The LEDs are visible in the dark, so this won't be ideal in a stealth environment. But by the same token, they do subtly indicate their presence, which could have value as a deterrence.The housing is also larger than the product images suggest -- think Australian beer can. Again, not stealthy, but possibly valuable as a deterrence. Bullet cam this is not.Overall excellent value.  Four stars - A good camera, better than most, especially at this price.

Reviews.Title: Good while it works.
Reviews.Author: J. Caple
Reviews.Content: Worked well when I first set it up.  Picture a little fuzzy but ok.  Then it stopped working completely after about three weeks.

Reviews.Title: VideoSecu Outdoor Day Night Security Camera Infrared Weatherproof CCTV Home 1/3" CCD
Reviews.Author: Ed C
Reviews.Content: The camera has a very good resolution but the casing is made of very thin material, infact I have never seen a camera casing so thin and I have purchased many CCTV cameras.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: ooom416354
Reviews.Content: This camera is excellent quality.  I bought it to replace a Night Owl camera which broke during a storm and it is perfect.  Great color and wide angle.

Reviews.Title: This is NOT a wireless / WiFi / IP camera
Reviews.Author: Fred Northshore
Reviews.Content: No I have not purchased this product. In the spirit of Amazon's generally UNreliable search engine, this is a hit to the search "wireless outdoor camera." Thanks Amazon for wasting my time. This may well be a quite good product but since it apparently needs a coax connection it does not make my cut.

ProductInfo.Features:
1/3" CCD, color DSP image sensor. NTSC system
420TV lines. 0 lux with IR LED
Built-in f 3.6mm lens for wide view angle. Built-in 28 IR leds for night vision.
All metal weatherproof housing and bracket. Water, dust and crush resistant glass coating
Package included: 1 x CCD camera, 1 x metal bracket, 1 x 12V DC 500mA power supply
ProductInfo.Name: VideoSecu Outdoor Day Night IR Bullet Security Camera Infrared Weatherproof CCTV Home 1/3" Color CCD 420 TV Lines Wide Angle Lens with Free Power Supply A71
